Uses of Package
org.robolectric.annotation

  • Packages that use org.robolectric.annotation 
    Package Description
    org.robolectric
    Package containing main Robolectric classes.
    org.robolectric.annotation
    Package containing Robolectric annotations.
    org.robolectric.shadows
    Package containing shadow classes for the Android SDK.
    org.robolectric.shadows.gms
    Shadows for the Google Play Services Library.
    org.robolectric.shadows.httpclient
    Shadows for Apache HTTP Client.
    org.robolectric.shadows.maps
    Shadows for Google Maps.
    org.robolectric.shadows.multidex
    Shadows for the Android Multidex Library.
    org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4
    Shadows for the Android Support Library.
  • Classes in org.robolectric.annotation used by org.robolectric 
    Class and Description
    Config
    Configuration settings that can be used on a per-class or per-test basis.
  • Classes in org.robolectric.annotation used by org.robolectric.annotation 
    Class and Description
    AccessibilityChecks.ForRobolectricVersion 
    Config
    Configuration settings that can be used on a per-class or per-test basis.
  • Classes in org.robolectric.annotation used by org.robolectric.shadows 
    Class and Description
    HiddenApi
    Indicates that the annotated method is hidden in the public Android API.
    Implementation
    Indicates that a method declaration is intended to Shadow a method with the same signature on the associated Android class.
    Implements
    Indicates that a class declaration is intended to Shadow an Android class declaration.
    RealObject
    Shadow fields annotated @RealObject will have the real instance injected.
    Resetter
    Indicates that the annotated method is used to reset static state in a shadow.
  • Classes in org.robolectric.annotation used by org.robolectric.shadows.gms 
    Class and Description
    Implementation
    Indicates that a method declaration is intended to Shadow a method with the same signature on the associated Android class.
